longDescription: Build the project on Monaca Cloud.
options: Should be one of - ios, android, windows
Should be one of - debug (for iOS, Android and Windows. It is default option.),
test (for iOS only), release (for iOS, Android and Chrome Apps)
The path in which the built file will be stored (specify also the filename)
If platform is android. Should be one of - default, crosswalk
Required if --android_webview is crosswalk. Should be one of - x86, arm
